name: INBillDetails
desc: The detailed information associated with a bill.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init?(billType: INBillType, paymentStatus: INPaymentStatus, billPayee: INBillPayee?, amountDue: INCurrencyAmount?, minimumDue: INCurrencyAmount?, lateFee: INCurrencyAmount?, dueDate: DateComponents?, paymentDate: DateComponents?)
items.desc: Initializes a bill details object with information about the bill to pay.

items.name: var paymentDate: DateComponents?
items.desc: The scheduled payment date for the bill.

items.name: var paymentStatus: INPaymentStatus
items.desc: The current status of the payment.

items.name: var minimumDue: INCurrencyAmount?
items.desc: The minimum amount to pay toward the bill.

items.name: var amountDue: INCurrencyAmount?
items.desc: The amount due for the bill.

items.name: var dueDate: DateComponents?
items.desc: The due date of the payment.

items.name: var lateFee: INCurrencyAmount?
items.desc: The late fee to apply if the payment is late.

items.name: enum INBillType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of bill.
